title: 写作笔记
author: tong
content:
第一次写作课：

小作文类型：

1）动态图：有时间变化（有2个或更多时间）=线图
内容：趋势+比较大小
2）静态图：无时间变化（有1个时间/未给出时间）=单饼
内容：比较大小
3）地图
4）流程图

小作文评分标准：TA&CC：小作文内容要求+逻辑安排

清晰的概括：

A）数据主要趋势：
overall, the chicken consumption experienced the only rise, accompanied by/compared to a decrease in that of beef, lamb and fish.
overall, China underwent the only decline in the number of applications, accompanied by a rise in that of the USA and Japan and some moderate waves in that of Russia.
B) 数据大小比较：最大值、最小值/参考终点决定
Besides, it was the USA that became the country with the most applications from 2006 while Russia always sent the fewest applications.
C) 某个特殊阶段：流程图/动态图：该时间段内 所有数据趋势相似或大小相近 大多数图表没有这个信息

重要值：

A）起点/终点
B）峰值/谷值：用文字强调出来
C）交点：在该时间点 两数据大小发生转折 尤其指最大值发生变化 重点；两数据在该时间点相等；与后来居上的数据写在一起；先把后来居上的数据整条线趋势写完 然后强调交点
there was a marked rise from 12,000 in 2004 to 28,000 in 2008 in the figure for the USA’s applications, which surpassed that of China in 2006.

the same period witnessed a relatively slight increase from 8,000 to 15, 000 in the quantity of Japan’s applications, with the number reaching the same point with that of China in 2007.

D) 最大值、次大值、最小值（图中数据较多的时候 有取有舍 有详有略）

相关的地方做比较：数据的趋势和大小的相似、差异较大之处

A）体现在主体段分段上：只用一套标准分段
B）体现在每个主体段的中心句上：发现的数据对比关系/分段思路
C）体现在不同段落和不同数据之间的衔接关系上
相反：however/by contrast/an opposite trend can be found in sth
相似：similarly/likewise/sth was in the same pattern with sth
其他：meanwhile/during the same period

主体段1:the whole period witnessed the only sustainable decrease in the number of China’s applications.

主体段2: However, both the USA and Japan saw a rise in the figure for their applications. Specifically, the USA…Similarly, Japan,…

主体段3:By contrast, some marginal fluctuations can be found in the quantity of Russia’s applications.

强调数据特征：

A）起点高但终点低/起点低但终点高（数据起点的极值信息）
at first, China sent much more applications than other countries, 27,000.
B) 数据的变化幅度最大或最小
sth experienced the most notable/the least notable change.
C) 数据之间的差距变大或变小
the gap between the three was widened/narrowed.

小作文框架：

首段：改写题目
主体段：2-3个主体段
尾段：概括图表信息：数据主要趋势+最大值、最小值/参考终点决定（+某个特殊阶段）

主体段1:The whole period witnessed the only sustainable decrease in the number of China’s applications.At first, it sent much more applications than other countries, 27,000， but the figure ended at only 10,000.

主体段2: However, both the USA and Japan saw a rise in the figure for their applications. Specifically, there was a marked rise from 12,000 in 2004 to 28,000 in 2008 in the figure for the USA’s applications, which surpassed that of China in 2006. Similarly, the same period witnessed a relatively slight increase from 8,000 to 15, 000 in the quantity of Japan’s applications, with the number reaching the same point with that of China in 2007.

主体段3:By contrast, some marginal fluctuations can be found in the quantity of Russia’s applications, which decreased slowly from 6,000 to the minimum of 5,000 over the first two years before a climb to the maximum of 7,000 in 2007 and a drop back to the initial figure at last.

尾段：overall, China underwent the only decline in the number of applications, accompanied by a rise in that of the USA and Japan and some moderate waves in that of Russia.Besides, it was the USA that became the country with the most applications from 2006 while Russia always sent the fewest applications.

小作文审题：

1）审题干：找描述对象
2）审小标题：找描述对象
3）审横纵坐标：找描述对象/时间/单位/题干补充信息
4）时间：动静态图/时态

过去+将来：1）中心句时态：一般现在式
2）尾段概括：趋势概括 一般现在式/最大值/最小值 一般将来
3）细节部分：根据具体情况决定时态
5)单位：million/billion/quadrillion/trillion/thousand 复数不加s/不能省略
ton/unit/minute/dollar 复数加s/可以适当做省略

rose from 6 million to the peak at 9 million tons

小作文首段写作：改写题目

题目结构：图表名称+展示动词+主题+区域+时间

The given table presents the proportion of consumer expense on three different types of items in five nations in 2002.

动态图：线图

1）描述顺序：
A）从高到低：参考起点决定
B）从左到右：按照时间发展顺序 从起点写到终点

2)单线写作：
A)句式变化：there be句型/时间见证者/被动态/主谓结构/国家见证
B)单线写作衔接词的变化：

3)多线写作：3线或以上：搞定主体段分段

A)按照数据大小（当数据的大小对比关系界限分明的时候）
B)按照数据趋势
C)按照数据变化幅度（按照数据大小和趋势不具备区分度的时候
